p: The IUCN distribution data are available ( 55, 56). ISIMIP climate and land-use data are available from the ISIMIP node of the ESG server ( https://esg.pik-potsdam.de/search/isimip/?product=input). The model output of the SDMs is publicly available as part of the Terrestrial Biodiversity Sector of ISIMIP ( https://esg.pik-potsdam.de/search/isimip/?sector=Terrestrial_Biodiversity). All analyses were done using the statistical software package R. R code of the analysis is available at https://github.com/christianhof/BioScen1.5_SDM.
